title: 528: Tony Robbins on Life Force: Precision Medicine to Transform Your Life
author: Katie Wells
description: Learn easy ways to improve your health, cutting-edge technology for diseases, and the role mindset plays in your wellness.
cleaned_text: This episode was a really exciting one for me because it's with someone who has influenced my life pretty dramatically. I'm here with Tony Robbins, who you've probably heard his name before, but if you haven't, he's an [entrepreneur](https://wellnessmama.com/podcast/ryan-moran/), #1 New York Times bestselling author, philanthropist, and leader that leaders call upon. This is a very wide-ranging episode. We talk a lot about his new book, Life Force, which I highly recommend. But he talks about so many aspects of the cutting-edge things we can do to improve our health as well as common easy things that we can do that make a big difference. We end with a really, really important conversation related to mindset and just how profound that is from a physical health perspective and how it crosses over into many other areas of life as well. Let's join Tony! Episode Highlights With Tony Robbins - The reason he felt called to write this particular book right now - How he reversed a "career-ending" diagnosis - The surprising place he attended the top regenerative medicine conference - How a family member getting terminal cancer sparked his research into alternative medicine - Why he jumps 1,000 times a day on stage and handles a million pounds of pressure on his joints each time he is on stage - The reason he always recommends a second opinion based on a Mayo clinic study where 88% of the time the diagnosis was different - Shocking new research about cancer diagnostics - How he maintains his incredible energy level using biohacks and daily habits - The 7 master genes that influence mitochondria and energy - How sirtuins affect energy, longevity, and disease - Ways to increase sirtuin activity - The new form of NMN that doesn't break down like other forms - Why he uses PEMF daily - The top six killers and how to avoid them - Fascinating research about sauna use - What finally got him to start getting enough sleep - Why heart attacks go up 24% in one day when we lose an hour in daylight savings time and the reverse happens when it goes back - Shocking research about the importance of sleep - His top sleep tips that make a big difference - How powerful the mind is for healing and why this is the most important factor - Why fear is one of the biggest risk factors for poor health - The three decisions that will change your life: what am I going to focus on, what does this mean, what am I going to do - Focus on where you want to go, not what you are afraid of - And more!
